tool_description: Get the geo data (Country, Region, Timezone, ..etc) of your client IP.
name: Client-IP .. Free IP Lookup
title: Client-IP .. Free IP Lookup

api_list.name: /lookup
api_list.description: Get the Geo IP details by the requester IP
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://client-ip.p.rapidapi.com/lookup"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "client-ip.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://client-ip.p.rapidapi.com/lookup"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "client-ip.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /lookup/{ip}
api_list.description: Lookup the geo info by IP
